message:
這則貼文的敘述，馬上想到看稅金在夜空中爆炸(煙火)的情景..

AR 定位稅金爆炸，討論頁面

description: Tired of feeling helpless, the people of Kaduna, Nigeria became the eyes & ears of the state's budget through a mobile app, which allowed them to alert the government if they saw signs of corruption. Learn more about this #OpenGov initiative here: http://bit.ly/2L2X8CP
name: Open Government Partnership
